column5: Have a look at what this feller experienced while tying into the Big 'Un!  http://www.fieldandstream.com/fieldstream/...32302_1,00.html
ouch....what a monster fish...glad that didn't happen to me when I caught my marlin....holy crap!
looks fishy to me I say its bunk
I don't know...maybe that's where Buster went...
Wow I hope that guy was Ok.A new sport awake boarding behind big fish.  That would wake me up in a hurry.
He did what he was told... "Hold on to this"
I hope the guy didnt wuss out, get up and barefoot ski behind that mother and keep your tip up
Well we gotta give him some credit here at least he didnt let go of the rod.  ..he did hold on all right...lol..lol..holy crap i hope he could swim thats for sure   cheers
I watched the rest of them.  This one is still my favorite, now matter how many times I watch it I still chuckle.  funny  Joey
